subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Novellist, a 13-2 shot trained in Germany by Andreas Wohler, won the $928,000 first-place prize in the King George VI and Queen Elizabeth II Stakes.
snippet: Novellist, a 13-2 shot trained in Germany by Andreas Wohler, won the $928,000 first-place prize in the King George VI and Queen Elizabeth II Stakes.
